products.title: 01. LA LAGARTIJA
products.description: Mysterious and treacherous... The best choice for start of yout journey! It will provide you a rich delicious flavour.

products.title: 02. EL TIGRE
products.description: Really dark coffee, only for the real gourmets. It has bitter flavour of grapefruits and is mixed with a little bit of peanuts with carmel.

products.title: 03. LA CUCARACHA
products.description: Sweet and intense with a big amount of different flavours. Carmel, grapes, strawberry, you name it! It's great choice for warm summer days.
